attributes.action: Legislate the job application and interview process
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Legislate the job application and interview process

Create legislation to ensure:-

That employers request proof / contact referees to ensure all CVs are truthful

That all job descriptions are true and employees can take action if needed

Questions and tests in an interview are fair

Ensure that all employers inform applicants if they are unsuccessful and must give a reason for this if requested.

For the many jobs I have applied for so far and was successful, I have suspected that the job descriptions are inaccurate and employers don’t deliver what they promise, We are required to be very courteous during application so we expect that back, just ignoring an applicant is disgusting.  Ensure fairness to all applicants to ensure CVs are truthful
